item.title: Career Development Plan
item.description: Preparing For Your Career Roadtrip “If you don’t know where you are going, you might wind up someplace else” –Yogi Berra This tutorial will provide an introduction and procedural methodology to creating a development plan. Why Should You Have A Career Development Plan? What defines a successful career for you? Does everybody need a plan in order to be successful? No. There’s such a thing as luck too. But I bet most people already have a plan in some variant or another.
